content.text: Dashboard now displays a summary view of data just like the view on the enclave’s page.  If a user does not have a favorite set for the dashboard the first scoped organization for that user is used and set as a favorite.
A user’s favorites are set by the organization or organizations the user is directly scoped to.
Enclaves page node selection type is now DITPR, Managed By and Owned By.
Enclaves page now displays a summary of aggregated data about the assets whether directly associated with or inherited by DITPR or Organization with further filtering of Managed By or Owned By.
Enclaves summary zone has a breadcrumb of how you navigated to what you are looking at.
Enclaves summary zone has a title matching the selection and is clickable to view more information.
The aggregated data is linked where possible and clicking the links will show you more detailed information.
Enclaves page summary zone also shows are bar graph displaying the top findings, up to 10, from the inherited assets.
Enclaves page summary zone shows a risk score card which is calculated by aggregating the data from the inherited assets.
Enclaves page summary zone also shows a summary card for the immediate children of the Organization selected, by either Managed By or Owned By.
The enclave page will show a not authorized message for parent Organizations that a user is not authorized to view while still allowing them to traverse the tree.
